: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus takes off for the base.
Rodimus Prime: Got it Blackfang. Just keep yourself in one piece.
 "Nic <wingedwarrior41@...>" <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:Blackfang was burnt on his right arm, so he switched his shotgun in
his left hand and shot once.

Blackfang: Got it, Rod. Just go for now, I'll act as the rear guard.

He switched to beast mode and ran a safe distance behind Rodimus. He
bared his teeth and growled.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus Prime: I never planned on it, my love.
> Rodimus closed his top.
> Rodimus Prime: Blackfang, pull out now and head for home. I'll trail
behind you.
> Rodimus' thoughts drifted to one single fact. He and Nighlight had a
daughter.

remember

won't

>
